description:
Garp puts Lina`s party in a pinch. Then appears the most powerful evil Lord, Fiblizo, who came after the traitor Garp.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Furtul sabiei luminii / Sfârşitul regelui dragonilor demoni
L`épée de lumière dérobée ! (La fin du seigneur des Démons)
The Stolen Sword of Light! The End of the Demon Dragon King!
Ubawareta Hikari no Ken! Maryuuou Saigo no Toki!
奪われた光の剣! 魔竜王最後の時!
